errors.error_description: Pinned specific version in installation command when latest version should be used
Incorrect command for development installation missing -e flag
correction_candidates: `pip install -e .` from the module root directory
`python setup.py develop` from the module root directory
`pip install .` from the module root directory
`python -m pip install --editable .` from the module root directory
errors.golden_answer: `pip install -e .` from the module root directory
